mapper.insert: insert into posting (member_id, account_history_id, club_code, posting_content) values(#{memberId}, #{accountHistoryId}, #{clubCode}, #{postingContent});
mapper.select: SELECT p.posting_id, p.member_id, p.account_history_id, p.club_code, p.posting_content, p.posting_created_time, COUNT(c.comment_id) AS comment_count FROM posting p LEFT JOIN comment c ON p.posting_id = c.posting_id WHERE p.club_code = #{clubCode} GROUP BY p.posting_id, p.member_id, p.account_history_id, p.club_code, p.posting_content, p.posting_created_time ORDER BY p.posting_id DESC;

SELECT posting_id AS postingId, member_id AS memberId, account_history_id AS accountHistoryId, club_code AS clubCode, posting_content AS postingContent, posting_created_time AS postingCreatedTime, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE posting_id = #{postingId}) AS commentCount FROM posting WHERE posting_id = #{postingId}
